title: SAP Business Security Liaison
summary: The SAP Business Governance team is seeking an SAP Security Professional with business process knowledge. The candidate selected for this role will be responsible for SAP Security infrastructure and user management across multiple SAP applications.
description:
- Design and implement SAP Security and provisioning solutions by working closely with business users, functional teams, and technical teams
- Develop security solutions through role design, source code analysis, business process analysis, and custom authorizations
- Engage with key stakeholders across IS&T and business teams, using experience and judgement to lead and define both standard and custom approaches to SAP Security
Design, implement, and maintain SAP solutions with an emphasis on managing risk, applying industry standards, and best practices
- Work with stakeholders to manage and mitigate Segregation of Duty conflicts
- Work with business teams daily to analyze security concerns, troubleshoot, and resolve access issues
- Coordinate and manage SAP Security aspects of assigned projects:
- Communicate and translate technical/business SAP Security requirements to all stakeholders
- Perform and present analysis on a global scale as needed by the project
- Create and meet deliverables per project plan based on technical and business requirements
- Define and communicate clear goals and expectations with all the stakeholders
- Deliver timely solutions for project issues
- Adapt to changing technology and apply it to evolving business needs
- Support daily user access requests for SAP applications
- Provide efficient and effective production support for internal and external partners
key_qualifications:
BA/BS with a minimum of 5 years hands on experience
Preference for candidates with 1-2 SAP S/4HANA implementations or migrations
Experience in SAP Ariba, SAP BTP, SAP Build Work Zone, SAP HANA XSA, and/or other new SAP technologies is a plus
Strong comprehension of SAP Security concepts
Ability to troubleshoot SAP Security issues
Understanding of business processes and the ability to discern complex business processes to apply best practice security methodologies
Ability and flexibility to effectively collaborate across multiple lines of business and geographies
Excellent communication and collaborative skills
Ability to independently manage a diverse workload in a complex and fast-paced environment
education_experience: BS degree in Management of Information Systems (or equivalent experience)
